metadata.Title: CVE-2021-36370 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Midnight Commander through 4.8.26. When establishing an SFTP connection, the fingerprint of the server is neither checked nor displayed. As a result, a user connects to the server without the ability to verify its authenticity.

criterions.comment: mc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
